(twist-fate [twistfate])

Requires 3S2A to forge (S1A1)

The Weavers of Phaeacia make the sails of the fabled Dark Ships that travel without oars or captains. But their skill in weaving is not limited to sail-making. They also weave fate and moonbeams into enchanted garments used by the queens and nobles of the Isle.
